name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"1eb71a6e-d340-4ff8-9a3d-47956386aaf9","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Group: Initialization and Identifier Management","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a8bd74bb-416e-40d6-bf75-807e8fa635bd","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Group Description","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c6f91f0a-504d-4c3a-b2af-efd66e56a498","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This group defines the foundational lifecycle of the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Fasten","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" formatter. It is responsible for initializing all internal data structures, ingesting analysis results from the call graph generator, and maintaining the identifier system required by the FASTEN schema.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ec68ee50-ac9f-412c-83cb-8c156e318cb8","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The correctness and consistency of every generated FASTEN artifact depend on this group. By centralizing setup logic and identifier management, it ensures that namespaces, modules, and relationships can be reliably referenced across different parts of the output.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a47df022-2c72-4cbb-a851-cd60cd2ac8fe","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"6d85364c-cd61-40f4-bb93-6da3ac72f178","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"init","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b3683686-c95c-4aa1-8146-34ed0c7dc4d8","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"__init__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method constructs a fully configured ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Fasten","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" formatter instance. It accepts a call graph generator along with package metadata such as product name, forge, version, and timestamp, and stores them for inclusion in the final FASTEN document.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"cf81ae19-b197-4080-8b62-69a7e4f71b1f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"During initialization, it eagerly retrieves all available analysis results from the generator, including internal modules, external modules, class definitions, call graph edges, and function names. These datasets form the raw input that subsequent methods transform into FASTEN-compliant structures.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e62e1de3-c64b-4d82-af28-26ed9d662a15","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role in the Group

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"This function establishes the formatter’s internal state and acts as the single source of truth for all analysis data. By loading and normalizing inputs at construction time, it simplifies later processing stages and avoids repeated access to the generator.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5d3e58a6-8efd-44b6-98a9-05117ff7589a","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Design Considerations","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b3534469-bfde-48ca-b21e-deb3c842bb93","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Uses defensive defaults (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"{}","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"[]","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") to handle missing or incomplete generator output","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1ce57641-1366-4a18-b42f-595a6df77fd0","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Separates analysis concerns from formatting logic","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"dc06351c-1a21-431e-b0da-a084706acb45","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Ensures all metadata required by the FASTEN schema is available throughout the formatter lifecycle","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7853aedd-e5fd-4a90-8758-8060ec6619e9","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"5bb727e1-82c8-4154-b760-47f54c4a6a71","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: get_unique_and_increment","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"33090416-590a-4b20-b922-62c628e9270b","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_unique_and_increment","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method returns a unique integer identifier and then increments an internal counter. Each identifier is guaranteed to be unique within the lifetime of a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Fasten","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" instance.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e7d1d450-25a2-4d38-a5eb-e14f4b45a878","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"These identifiers are primarily used to label namespaces within FASTEN module definitions, where stable numeric references are required instead of string-based names.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"99de2550-ccc6-4a5f-87af-ba6b73515ae0","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role in the Group

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"This function provides a centralized and deterministic mechanism for namespace identification. It ensures that namespaces can be referenced consistently across modules, class hierarchies, and call graph edges without ambiguity.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a358b69a-aff7-4a8c-882c-1c8f2d450308","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Design Considerations","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a38b0f48-9426-4aea-bf01-078472569130","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Maintains simplicity and predictability through sequential numbering","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e70aa4b3-016e-4734-9260-d09e79b74234","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Avoids collisions by scoping uniqueness to a single formatter instance","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7d91cc2d-c6d1-4121-bc3a-704a45e2537a","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Supports FASTEN schema requirements for numeric namespace identifiers","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f2e693d0-c975-418f-b349-f6eac36ce5c3","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"b2e6fafe-bc09-4f0a-bf2a-e7ab2add9139","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
